title: California Wants Renewable Energy For Half Its Power By 2030
text:
08 California Wants Renewable Energy For Half Its Power By 2030 
Time: Gov. Jerry Brown dramatically increased Californiaâ€™s climate-change goals, committing the state to use renewable energy for half its electricity and make existing buildings twice as energy-efficient in just 15 years.
